p: A questionnaire was sent on March 20, 2020 to 19 paediatric gastroenterology centers in China to evaluate the impact of COVID-19 on the prognosis of IBD children. These centers were distributed across 15 cities including Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Hangzhou, Chongqing, Chengdu, Wuhan, Changsha, Zhengzhou, Xiâ€™an, Xiamen, Guiyang, Nanjing, and Shenyang, in total care for 1431 children with IBD.
